movies.title: O Candidato Honesto
movies.plot: The corrupt congressman João Ernesto Praxedes is the favorite in the dispute of the presidency of Brazil. His assessor Marcelinho is preparing him for the debate on the second round of the election and he is summoned to a Parliamentary Commission of Inquiry in the Congress. When his grandmother is near death, João visits her and she curses him to be honest and always tell the truth. Now João has a big trouble since he needs to dispute the presidential election and respond the inquiry of the commission telling only the truth.
movies.simplePlot: John is a corrupt politician wanting to be the Brazil's next president. He receives an enchantment from his grandmother and can't lie anymore. Now he must win the presidential elections telling only the truth.

biography.bio: Marcello Caridade is an actor, known for O Candidato Honesto (2014), Os Caras de Pau em O Misterioso Roubo do Anel (2014) and Os Caras de Pau (2010).
biography.name: Marcello Caridade

biography.placeOfBirth: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
biography.bio: Leandro Hassum was born on September 26, 1973 in Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. He is an actor, known for Till Luck Do Us Part (2012), O Candidato Honesto (2014) and Till Luck Do Us Part 2 (2013).
biography.name: Leandro Hassum

biography.placeOfBirth: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
biography.bio: Luiza Valdetaro was born on September 7, 1985 in Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil as Luiza dos Santos Valdetaro. She is an actress, known for O Candidato Honesto (2014), Seize the Day (2009) and America (2005). She was previously married to Alberto Blanco.
biography.name: Luiza Valdetaro

biography.bio: Cláudio Cinti is an actor, known for La cité des hommes (2007), O Candidato Honesto (2014) and So Normal (2003).
biography.name: Cláudio Cinti

biography.bio: Julia Cartier is an actress, known for O Candidato Honesto (2014).
biography.name: Julia Cartier

biography.bio: Ellen Rocche was born on July 19, 1979 in São Paulo, São Paulo, Brazil. She is an actress, known for O Candidato Honesto (2014), The Illusionist (2011) and Tangled Hearts (2013).
biography.name: Ellen Rocche

biography.bio: Iran Meu Nêgo is an actor, known for O Candidato Honesto (2014).
biography.name: Iran Meu Nêgo

biography.placeOfBirth: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
biography.bio: Antonio Pedro was born on November 11, 1940 in Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil as Antônio Pedro Borges de Oliveira. He is an actor and writer, known for Head Over Heels (2010), In Therapy (2009) and Muito Prazer (1979). He is married to Andrea Bordadagua. They have one child. He was previously married to Sílvia Sangirardi and Margot Baird.
biography.name: Antonio Pedro

biography.bio: Aramis Trindade was born in 1965 in Fazenda Nova, Pernambuco, Brazil. He is an actor and producer, known for Sparkling Girls (2012), Pirlimpimpim (2001) and Lisbela and the Prisoner (2003).
biography.name: Aramis Trindade

biography.bio: Leo Wainer is an actor, known for Aquarius (2016), O Candidato Honesto (2014) and Trap.com (2011).
biography.name: Leo Wainer

biography.bio: Rodrigo Candelot is an actor, known for Elite Squad: The Enemy Within (2010), Head Over Heels (2010) and O Candidato Honesto (2014).
biography.name: Rodrigo Candelot

biography.bio: Heitor Vignoli is an actor, known for Head Over Heels (2010), O Candidato Honesto (2014) and Loucas pra Casar (2015).
biography.name: Heitor Vignoli

biography.bio: Charles Myara is an actor, known for O Candidato Honesto (2014), Kickboxer 3: The Art of War (1992) and Destinées (1997).
biography.name: Charles Myara

biography.bio: Murilo Grossi was born in 1964 in Brasília, Distrito Federal, Brazil. He is an actor and producer, known for The Clone (2001), Une famille brésilienne (2008) and If Nothing Else Works Out (2008).
biography.name: Murilo Grossi

biography.bio: Prazeres Barbosa was born in 1950 in Caruaru, Pernambuco, Brazil. She is an actress, known for The Expendables (2010), Elite Squad: The Enemy Within (2010) and The Machine (2005).
biography.name: Prazeres Barbosa
